metadata.title: CVE-2016-4428 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon)8.0.1 and earlier and 9.0.0 through 9.0.1 allows remote authenticated usersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML by injecting an AngularJS templatein a dashboard form.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openstack-dashboard - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
openstack-dashboard-ubuntu-theme - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
python-django-horizon - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: horizon package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1').
